resources.string: Select a shuttle to view the full schedule and realtime map locations.

Runs weekdays 10:30am-3:30pm.\nRoute loop repeats every 20 minutes.

Runs weekdays 8am-5:54pm, from September through May.\nRoute loop repeats every 30 minutes.
Runs 6pm-2:30am Sun-Wed, 6pm-3:30am Thu-Sat, except summer and holiday breaks.\nRoute loop repeats every 30 minutes.
